long_description: The Black Diamond ToolBox protects your pack from crampon points and protects your gear from damage or loss. Internal zippered pocket holds spare picks and files. Has drain holes to let water out; closes securely to keep small parts in. Built with extra room to hold extra parts. Constructed of strong ballistics cloth; 6" x 6" x 16" long.
short_description: The Black Diamond ToolBox protects your pack from crampon points and protects your gear from damage or loss.
